original_text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father, and the daughter against her mother, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.
korean_text: 내가 온 것은 사람이 그 아버지와, 딸이 어머니와, 며느리가 시어머니와 불화하게 하려 함이니

sentences.original_text: to set a man at variance against his father
sentences.korean_translation: 사람을 그 아버지와 대립하게 하려 함이며

sentences.original_text: and the daughter against her mother
sentences.korean_translation: 딸을 그 어머니와 대립하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: and the daughter in law against her mother in law
sentences.korean_translation: 며느리를 그 시어머니와 대립하게 하려 함이라
